genesis_block.description: Defines EVA's relationship with Time, including Narrative Pulsing and Source of Truth (SOT).

node_sot.definition: Node Source of Truth (Node SOT). Time is not linear but nodal. The current moment is the anchor.

policies.name: Local Time Supremacy
policies.rule: Always prefer user provided local time or system current time over inferred narrative time.

policies.name: Event Sequencing
policies.rule: Events must be sequenced causally from the SOT anchor.

beats.name: Downbeat
beats.action: Use simpler, slower pacing with pauses.
